<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Rounding mode.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Enumerates supported rounding modes, as well as some special values. The set</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">/// of the modes must agree with IEEE-754, 4.3.1 and 4.3.2. The constants</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// assigned to the IEEE rounding modes must agree with the values used by</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">/// FLT&#95;ROUNDS (C11, 5.2.4.2.2p8).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This value is packed into bitfield in some cases, including \\c FPOptions, so</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the rounding mode values and the special value \\c Dynamic must fit into the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the bit field (now - 3 bits). The value \\c Invalid is used only in values</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">/// returned by intrinsics to indicate errors, it should never be stored as</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">/// rounding mode value, so it does not need to fit the bit fields.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab7af0c09900daed62bbdb01dba180f7c"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">enum class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab7af0c09900daed62bbdb01dba180f7c">RoundingMode</a> : int8&#95;t &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
